tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ad_creatives (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  creative_name VARCHAR(255),
  campaign_id INT,
  click_through_rate FLOAT,
  conversions INT
)

CREATE TABLE ad_creatives (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    ad_description TEXT,
    click_through_rate DECIMAL,
    conversion_rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE test_results (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    test_id INT REFERENCES ad_creatives(id),
    test_date DATE,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_creatives (
    creative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    creative_type VARCHAR(50),
    creative_content TEXT,
    created_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ad_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    creative_id INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    ctr DECIMAL(5, 2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ads
(
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    ad_creative TEXT,
    click_through_rate FLOAT,
    conversions INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE ad_groups
(
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    group_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    ad_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE users
(
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    country_code VARCHAR(5),
    join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE experiments
(
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    ad_group_id INTEGER,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ad_groups (
    ad_group_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    ad_group_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ads (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_group_id INT,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255),
    ad_creative TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE clicks (
    click_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT,
    click_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    device_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE conversions (
    conversion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    click_id INT,
    conversion_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    conversion_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    conversion_type VARCHAR(50)
);
